As part of our general terms of service ("TOS"), we have developed this transparent and clear privacy policy ("Privacy Policy") that explains how we collect, use, protect, and disclose your Personal Data (as defined below) and data when you use the Calrik website at calrik.com and all related sites, domains, materials, information, software, software-as-a-service, applications, and services (collectively, the "Services").
Privacy Policy

1 . Who is collecting and/or processing your data?

We collect and/or process your data.
We may keep certain information even after you close your account if necessary to comply with our legal obligations, meet regulatory requirements, resolve disputes, and prevent fraud and abuse.
We may keep your data in published or unpublished format on the website or in backups of the website.

This Website may automatically collect information as you browse such as the internet service provider, browser type and version, Operating system, device type, average time spent, pages viewed, Internet protocol (IP) address used to connect your computer to the internet, and any other such relevant statistics.
